data.scripts.terrain

Class MagicAsteroidFieldTerrainPlugin

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fs.starfarer.api.impl.campaign.terrain.BaseTerrain
      • com.fs.starfarer.api.impl.campaign.terrain.BaseRingTerrain
        • com.fs.starfarer.api.impl.campaign.terrain.AsteroidBeltTerrainPlugin
          • com.fs.starfarer.api.impl.campaign.terrain.AsteroidFieldTerrainPlugin
            • data.scripts.terrain.MagicAsteroidFieldTerrainPlugin
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.fs.starfarer.api.campaign.CampaignTerrainPlugin, com.fs.starfarer.api.impl.campaign.terrain.AsteroidSource

    public class MagicAsteroidFieldTerrainPlugin
extends com.fs.starfarer.api.impl.campaign.terrain.AsteroidFieldTerrainPlugin
    This is a drop-in replacement for the vanilla AsteroidFieldTerrainPlugin.

    For example usage, see Roider Union by SafariJohn.

    Author:
    SafariJohn, Tartiflette
